001/*

004 */
005
006package dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.selection;
007
008import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
009
010import java.util.List;
011
012import dev.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
013import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.IncludeAll;
014import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.ProfileImport;
015import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.control.catalog.IControl;
016import dev.metaschema.oscal.lib.model.control.profile.IProfileSelectControlById;
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018
019public interface IControlFilter {
020  @NonNull
021  IControlFilter ALWAYS_MATCH = new IControlFilter() {
022    @Override
023    @NonNull
024    public Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch) {
025      return IControlSelectionFilter.MATCH;
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    @NonNull
030    public IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter() {
031      return IControlSelectionFilter.ALL_MATCH;
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    @NonNull
036    public IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter() {
037      return IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
038    }
039  };
040
041  @NonNull
042  IControlFilter NONE_MATCH = new IControlFilter() {
043
044    @Override
045    @NonNull
046    public Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch) {
047      return IControlSelectionFilter.NON_MATCH;
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    @NonNull
052    public IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter() {
053      return IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    @NonNull
058    public IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter() {
059      return IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
060    }
061  };
062
063  /**
064   * Construct a new filter instance based on the provided profile import
065   * statement.
066   *
067   * @param profileImport
068   *          an OSCAL profile import statement
069   * @return a new control filter
070   */
071  @NonNull
072  static IControlFilter newInstance(@NonNull ProfileImport profileImport) {
073    return new Filter(profileImport);
074  }
075
076  @NonNull
077  static IControlFilter newInstance(@NonNull IControlSelectionFilter includes,
078      @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter excludes) {
079    return new Filter(includes, excludes);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Determines if the control is matched by this filter. This method returns a
084   * {@link Pair} where the first member of the pair indicates if the control
085   * matches, and the second indicates if the match applies to child controls as
086   * well.
087   *
088   * @param control
089   *          the control to check for a match
090   * @return a pair indicating the status of the match ({@code true} for a match
091   *         or {@code false} otherwise), and if a match applies to child controls
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  default Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control) {
095    return match(control, false);
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Determines if the control is matched by this filter. This method returns a
100   * {@link Pair} where the first member of the pair indicates if the control
101   * matches, and the second indicates if the match applies to child controls as
102   * well.
103   *
104   * @param control
105   *          the control to check for a match
106   * @param defaultMatch
107   *          the match status to use if the filter doesn't have an explicit hit
108   * @return a pair indicating the status of the match ({@code true} for a match
109   *         or {@code false} otherwise), and if a match applies to child controls
110   */
111  @NonNull
112  Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch);
113
114  @NonNull
115  IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter();
116
117  @NonNull
118  IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter();
119
120  class Filter implements IControlFilter {
121    @NonNull
122    private final IControlSelectionFilter inclusionFilter;
123    @NonNull
124    private final IControlSelectionFilter exclusionFilter;
125
126    public Filter(@NonNull ProfileImport profileImport) {
127      IncludeAll includeAll = profileImport.getIncludeAll();
128
129      if (includeAll == null) {
130        List<? extends IProfileSelectControlById> includeSelections = profileImport.getIncludeControls();
131        if (includeSelections.isEmpty()) {
132          this.inclusionFilter = IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
133        } else {
134          this.inclusionFilter = new DefaultControlSelectionFilter(includeSelections);
135        }
136      } else {
137        this.inclusionFilter = IControlSelectionFilter.ALL_MATCH;
138      }
139
140      List<? extends IProfileSelectControlById> excludeSelections = profileImport.getExcludeControls();
141      if (excludeSelections.isEmpty()) {
142        this.exclusionFilter = IControlSelectionFilter.NONE_MATCH;
143      } else {
144        this.exclusionFilter = new DefaultControlSelectionFilter(excludeSelections);
145      }
146
147    }
148
149    public Filter(@NonNull IControlSelectionFilter includes, @NonNull IControlSelectionFilter excludes) {
150      this.inclusionFilter = includes;
151      this.exclusionFilter = excludes;
152    }
153
154    @Override
155    @NonNull
156    public IControlSelectionFilter getInclusionFilter() {
157      return inclusionFilter;
158    }
159
160    @Override
161    @NonNull
162    public IControlSelectionFilter getExclusionFilter() {
163      return exclusionFilter;
164    }
165
166    @Override
167    public Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(@NonNull IControl control, boolean defaultMatch) {
168      @NonNull
169      Pair<Boolean, Boolean> result = getInclusionFilter().apply(control);
170      boolean left = ObjectUtils.notNull(result.getLeft());
171      if (left) {
172        // this is a positive include match. Is it excluded?
173        Pair<Boolean, Boolean> excluded = getExclusionFilter().apply(control);
174        if (ObjectUtils.notNull(excluded.getLeft())) {
175          // the effective result is a non-match
176          result = IControlSelectionFilter.NON_MATCH;
177        }
178      } else {
179        result = defaultMatch ? IControlSelectionFilter.MATCH : IControlSelectionFilter.NON_MATCH;
180      }
181      return result;
182    }
183
184  }
185
186}
